title: William Kapell discography

section_text: The listing below contains only Compact Disc releases and does not contain 78rpm , LP , Cassette , or 8-track tape releases .
intro: William Kapell (September 20, 1922 - October 29, 1953) was an American classical pianist who recorded for RCA Victor.
